signUp.firstSubTitle: Fancy retiring early, travelling the world, spending more time with loved ones?  Make it happen with Sprive!
signUp.secondSubTitle: We suggest the optimal amount to pay, taking years off your mortgage and saving you thousands of pounds
signUp.thirdSubTitle: Daily monitoring. Our free expert advisors could save you up to £300 per month by remortgaging to a better deal (coming soon)

saveInterest.cardText: The amount you’re paying your bank in interest alone
saveInterest.saveMoney: With Sprive, you can save thousands by always being on the best deal and making smarter payments

saveInterest.secondHeader: Smarter payments to maximise your savings
saveInterest.secondListOne: Pay off your mortgage as quickly as you can
saveInterest.secondListTwo: Chip away without impacting your lifestyle
saveInterest.currentlySupports: Sprive supports repayment mortgages on your home
saveInterest.readyForYou: and we’ll let you know as soon as we’re ready for you

setGoalScreen.title: Set Goal
setGoalScreen.howQuickly: How quickly would you like to be Mortgage free?
setGoalScreen.youCanAdjust: You can adjust your goals anytime and no payment will ever leave your account without your approval
setGoalScreen.ercTitle: In potential breach of ERC limit
setGoalScreen.ercMessage: While most lenders allow you to overpay up to 10% of your mortgage balance in a year without incurring Early Repayment Charges (ERC), please check with your lender if you are unsure
setGoalScreen.setGoalUpdatePopup: Sprive assumes that you are on a repayment-only mortgage and that overpayments have the effect of reducing your mortgage term and not your future payments.

dashBoard.keepItUp: You’re on track. Keep it up

overPaymentHistory.basicInfo: Most lenders allow you to overpay up to 10% of your mortgage balance a year but do check if you’re not sure. You risk being charged early repayment fees if you pay over the permitted amount.
